channel.title: (rs) clan tsl reqruiting
channel.description:
hi my name is adiosk8r93 from the runescape clan the slayers lair... here are some of the things that our clan has... we are a very active clan most of us are on about 5 hours a day... 80+ combat plz... and when filling out your clan application tell them adiosk8r93 reqruited you
[IMG]http://img131.imageshack.us/img131/7692/slayerslair2pv2.gif[/img]
[align=center][b][URL=http://www.runehead.com/clans/ml.php?clan=Miner69er8]Members[/URL] - [URL=http://z11.invisionfree.com/RS_TSL/index.php?act=idx]Forums[/URL][/b]
[b]Welcome to The Slayer's Lair Recruitment Topic![/b]
[b]Introduction[/b]
[b]Thank you, for taking your time out and viewing this topic. The Slayer's Lair is a clan that has been through alot over the past couple of years. This clan was a top clan at one point in time but after going through hardships the clan crumbled down. Now The Slayer's Lair has been rebuilt and reconstructured with a new leadership team. This clan is based on a democracy, From my years of experience I have learned that it's what the members want. We will vote on any important debates to prevent questions and controversy, because quite frankly without the members a clan would be absolutely nothing.[/b]
[b]The Clan[/b]
[b]The Slayer's Lair is a great place to find new friends. We will welcome you with open arms. We have a great community and atmosphere. We have a chat room which you can find us in, #tsl. Stop in and say hi![/b]
[b]Events:[/b]
Player Killing Trips King Black Dragon Killing Kalphite Queen Money Making Combat Competitions Friendly Wars Full Out Wars And Other Fun Events
New Pictures Coming Soon!!
[IMG]http://img292.imageshack.us/img292/2234/tsl5jg3.png[/img]
We Like War.
[b]Leader Miner69er8 - 100
Advisor All_Must_Dye - 93
Cabinent Dragulan - 94[/b]
Position are open!!![/align]

hi my name is adiosk8r93 from the runescape clan the slayers lair… here are some of the things that our clan has… we are a very active clan most of us are on about 5 hours a day… 80+ combat plz… and when filling out your clan application tell them adiosk8r93 reqruited you

[align=center]Members - Forums

Welcome to The Slayer’s Lair Recruitment Topic!

Introduction

Thank you, for taking your time out and viewing this topic. The Slayer’s Lair is a clan that has been through alot over the past couple of years. This clan was a top clan at one point in time but after going through hardships the clan crumbled down. Now The Slayer’s Lair has been rebuilt and reconstructured with a new leadership team. This clan is based on a democracy, From my years of experience I have learned that it’s what the members want. We will vote on any important debates to prevent questions and controversy, because quite frankly without the members a clan would be absolutely nothing.

The Clan

The Slayer’s Lair is a great place to find new friends. We will welcome you with open arms. We have a great community and atmosphere. We have a chat room which you can find us in, #tsl. Stop in and say hi!

Events:

Player Killing Trips
King Black Dragon Killing
Kalphite Queen
Money Making
Combat Competitions
Friendly Wars
Full Out Wars
And Other Fun Events

New Pictures Coming Soon!!

We Like War.
